title: Mountain Heart
teaser: Their current sound has been described as "acoustic overdrive", "slam grass", and "folk rock on steroids". But in the beginning, when founding members Steve Gulley and Adam Steffey were still in the band, they were more traditionally oriented. We'll be featuring music from the early days of Mountain Heart, one of the most illustrious and distinctive bands to ever roll down the bluegrass highway.
